summary: A family in a house, and a chain of events that take place, on an ordinary evening that they plan to have dinner with relatives.
cast: Jenny Schily|Anjorka Strechel|Mia Kasalo|Luk Pfaff|Matthias Dittmer|Armin Marewski|Leon Alan Beiersdorf|Sabine Werner|Kathleen Morgeneyer|Monika Hetterle|Gustav Körner|Lea Draeger|Ferdinand|Kasimir
title: Das merkwürdige Kätzchen
